note_to_self.attr1: make sure kind faction isn't hostile

content.attr1: Welcome back.
I have a secure channel to Elephant Face.
Patching you in.
We've verified the intel Hammond gave us.
And formulated a plan on acquiring Taz.
We've decided to give the job to you.
Rather than risking bringing someone new in.
The problem is the official bounty on Taz.
With it in place, it's nearly impossible for him to reach safety.
Safety... that's his price...
To give up the group that hired him to smuggle Stubs.
We need you to infiltrate the Pride.
Gain the rank and ship needed to accept the bounty.
We'll then have Hammond collect Taz.
You'll collect the bounty.
Only... No one will die.
Taz and Hammond will be transported to Sanctuary.
And tell us how to find the smugglers.
So there it is...
We'll talk next when you are on the way to collect the bounty.
